httpsfinder_description.message: Automatically detect and alert when SSL is available on a web page. Automated rule creation for HTTPS Everywhere

httpsfinder_main_NoHttpsEverywhere.message: It doesn't look like you have HTTPS Everywhere installed. Rules will be saved, but not enforced until you install it.

httpsfinder_main_autoForwardRulePrompt.message: HTTPS enforced. Save this rule for HTTPS Everywhere? (Note: Services offered over HTTPS may differ from the HTTP version)

httpsfinder_main_httpsFoundPrompt.message: It looks like there's an encrypted version of this page. Would you like to go there now?

httpsfinder_main_restartPrompt.message: Rule will be enforced after next Firefox restart. Restart now? (Tabs will be saved)

httpsfinder_main_restartPromptPrivate.message: Rule will be enforced after next Firefox restart. Restart now? Tabs will NOT be saved (private browsing enabled)

httpsfinder_main_ruleAddedText.message: Rule will be enforced by HTTPS-Everywhere after the next browser restart.

httpsfinder_main_saveRulePrompt.message: Save this rule for HTTPS Everywhere? (Note: Services offered over HTTPS may differ from the HTTP version)

httpsfinder_main_selfSignedAlert.message: This page offered a self-signed certificate for HTTPS. Add to whitelist, or go to the HTTPS page and add the exception. NOTE: HTTPS Finder won't enforce HTTPS on self signed sites. Create a rule if you want to always go HTTPS.

httpsfinder_overlay_whitelistReset.message: Whitelist and session detection results cleared

httpsfinder_preference_detectionDescLONG.message: HEAD requests use less bandwidth than GET, but some servers may not support them. If this happens, HTTPS Finder will attempt to fall back to a GET request.

httpsfinder_preference_detectionDescRec.message: Recommended setting: If you have a fast connection, uncheck to use GET only.  On slower connections, HEAD first may be noticeably faster on most sites.

httpsfinder_preference_headFirst.message: Use HEAD detection first (Fall back to GET if not supported by server)

httpsfinder_preference_noHTTPSAlertTitle.message: Enable HTTPS Found alerts (if auto-enforce HTTPS is disabled)

httpsfinder_preference_noHTTPSAlertToolt.message: Uncheck for silent detection only. View results and create rules from the Advanced tab

httpsfinder_preference_noResultsPB.message: No results saved in Private Browsing

httpsfinder_preference_noRulePrompt.message: Do not prompt to save HTTPS rule (For use without HTTPS Everywhere)

httpsfinder_preference_ruleTip.message: For whitelist rules, note that www.domain.com is a subdomain of domain.com.

httpsfinder_preference_savedRulesTip.message: Saved rules can be disabled in HTTPS Everywhere settings.

httpsfinder_preference_secureCookies.message: Secure cookies for valid HTTPS domains

httpsfinder_preference_secureWildcardCoo.message: Also secure wildcard cookies for HTTPS domains

httpsfinder_preference_showpreview.message: Show rule preview (allows editing) before saving rules

httpsfinder_preference_translations.message: Translations provided by the following individuals:

httpsfinder_preference_whitelistLabel.message: Domain Whitelist (Do not detect HTTPS on these domains)

httpsfinder_rulePreview_tip1.message: Any changes you make will be reflected in the saved rule.

httpsfinder_rulePreview_tip2.message: Click OK to save the rule, or Cancel to go back without saving
